title: LG 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart TV  (43LM5650PTA)

product_specification.In The Box: MANUAL WARRANTY CARD:1U CARD: 1U REMOTE: 1U BATTERY: 2U
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: DAT, MPG, MPEG, VOB, AVI, DIVX, MP4, MKV, TS, TRP,
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Cinema, Clear Voice III, Cricket, Music, Game
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Zee5, AltBalaji, Apple TV, Eros Now, Google Movies, Voot, Yupp TV, Sun Nxt
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty and Additional 1 Year Warranty is Applicable on Panel only. (Offer valid till 30 - April - 2022)
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.LG WebOS for Unlimited Entertainment: This LG Smart TV runs on WebOS and lets you enjoy your favorite shows and movies on Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+ Hotstar, and other OTT platforms.
product_description.Full-HD Display: The visuals on the Full-HD display of this TV come alive with stunning details and vivid colors.

review:
Product: If you need a branded budget "secondary" TV for fully, largely STB use like I needed, this is best pick. Good picture, great sound. Only Flip side, 2 stars energy rating. The rest is proportional to its price, that's fair. Does primary job(stb) of a TV well. Recommended for same.

FLIPKART: Delivered in less than 15hrs. Fantastic.

LG: Installed ~26 hours after delivery. A night delayed than first intimated by them. No big problem that but has to be mentioned. Problem, I only wanted table mount, on casual enquiry, technicians said wall mount would cost Rs 1200 whereas it's free obviously. Ha! And I wasn't given a standard wall bracket, whether I am owed one even if table mounted couldn't get clarified.
Poor from LG. Beware.

Picture looks wonderful. Loved the look and feel of the television. Remote could have been better. Sound quality could be better as well. Very smooth delivery and installation from Flipkart. Got it on exchange and took just a day to install the same. Would be even better if installation could be even faster for exchanges!

Picture clarity is awesome if you have good cable connection. Excellent Connectivity. Sound is Okay. For more sound, external speakers are mandatory. Bought under EMI offer for the first time from Flipkart. So value for money. Feel Happy for the Purchase

Good TV for this price but they should have given smart remote as well. Sound is good and picture quality is good for this price range. I am little surprised that delivery person was not wearing mask even after asking to wear he didn’t . Over all TV purchase is good.

Picture quality is not good even for HD channels. I am using Airtel DTH.
For fast movements it become blurred. You can check while watching Cricket match.
Sound quality is fine and various modes are available.

Its been 7 months using this tv and here are my opinions
Picture quality and sound quality are great (as expected).
There is no Bluetooth connectivity hence you cannot connect external Bluetooth speaker or headset to it. Only WiFi is available and the connectivity is great.
Since it runs webOS, although they give prominent apps to download, there is no vast library of apps like android does.
Rest all is great. I love it.

Nice TV. Working fine. Very Good picture quality. Enough sound. No bluetooth but it has 3.5 mm headphone jack. Web OS is little boring. I am using Nokia media streamer with this TV and all my problem like Android OS, bluetooth, Google chromecast, playstore support, Google voice assistance etc. are solved now. Moreover I bought this TV in this Big billion sale at very good discount. Totally Value for money product. LG brand has largest customer support service centre in INDIA. My installation was done within 1 hour of delivery of the product.

Thanks to flipkart & Lg.
Under this price LG provide very good quality.

Pros:
--------
Picture - 4.5
Sound - 4.0
Pannel - 3.8
Connectivity - 3.5

Cons:
---------
Connectivity problem facing.
Under this price other company TV's providing Dolby Atmos & Dolby Vision.
Web OS is not much options compare to Android.
Very low ram & rom.
Only one Usb port.
Only one Hdmi & Hdmi arc.
Support only Single Band wifi 2.4Ghz.
No chrome cast support.
----_------_-------_-------_-------

Packing & Delivery was amazing day before only delivered and installation person also very nice.

Overall under this price good quality Picture and decent sound.

Nice picture quality and sound also good, I'm really impressed with LG and they provide super quality, thank to Flipkart give amazing product to us on home delivery, finally product more than good our experience..

Product is awesome , everything is good , because the LG always gives the best quality ..so its great..but flipkart service is not good as expected, late delivery is there ..Installation was done next day of the delivery.. So it's good product..

After looking at many products between 20K to 35K for 43 inch Smart TV, I selected this one. The delivery was done as promised and installation was done within a few hours of the delivery. This Full HD Smart TV met my expectations in terms of brand, price (30K), picture, and sound. I have not come across any other good brand TV at this price. The picture looks great and also the sound the quality/volume. The standard remote was also easy to use for Smart TV apps.

Refresh rate of picture is slow. In case of fast moving video, it shows blury. Also processing speed is slow. If you select any option, it takes time to reflect. Expected magic remote as well but it didn't come with the product.
Excellent picture quality. No connectivity problem. Sound quality also very good. If you want a reliable brand and good viewing experience then you must go for it. Completely value for money.

The picture quality is good and works well with DTH, instead of cable. City cable wont be able to provide much better quality.

I got this product wen it was quoting at 31000..so got a instant discount of 2000 and 5% cashback after 3 months.ordered from flipkart axis bank credit card.
Final-27550
As. A expected nd picture quality is brilliant and installation boy is full explain what features in tv even fast delivery as a promise nd installation after delivery 1 day

Bought Lg as it is a well known brand in tv market. Sound is superb. Picture quality is bit compromised here and there when we watch live football matches. App support and internal storage are a let down. Navigating thru app and settings with the provided remote is little bit difficult. But, if u want to use it is as "TV" alone, it's a good value for money device.
Installation was done on the next day of delivery. They even provided wall mount even though I didn't mount it on wall.
Kudos to LG

After using for 1 week I am giving this review. Picture quality is very good.

Sound is low in standard mode. If we setup sound in DTS virtual x mode then sound is good. When watching content through internet sound is amazing.
Screencast is ohkkk. You can even use LG TV plus app for this purpose.

Remote is ok, typing is difficult but using mobile remote (LG TV plus app) makes the job a little easier.
Wall mount has been delivered free of cost by installation person. No papers given for 3 year warranty.

Installation process may be given by LG and behaviour of LG customer care directly as soon as the product was delivered and keep following till installation.

Product is excellent for tight budgets.

Try to utilise all the discounts being given by Flipkart while purchasing this product.

Only 1 usb port and 2 hdmi and no bluetooth support are the only drawbacks on this tv as compared to other brand tvs though we might get a 4k tv at this price from small brands lg has good customer support than those brands. Though i heard we can use a usb hub and connect many usb drives to over come the usb problem. Webos is very interesting for the TV but the app support of webos is not that great(All major ott platforms are available except sonyliv and jiocinema as of writing this review).But in future we cant expect all the new ott apps to the content store as it is dependent on app developers to provide apps for old webos and LG wont provide any webos updates for their tvs.Over all a decent buy if you are looking for LG FHD tvs.
